questions.question: The 2019 World Cup final was decided by a Super Over.
Australia has appeared in more World Cup finals than any other team.
The first World Cup final was played at Lord's Cricket Ground.
India has won the World Cup final on home soil.
No World Cup final has ever been decided by the Duckworth-Lewis method.
England had never won a World Cup final before 2019.
The 1999 World Cup final ended in a tie.
Sri Lanka won their only World Cup final in 1996.
Pakistan has lost more World Cup finals than they have won.
The West Indies appeared in the first three consecutive World Cup finals.
